title: Explore Words

footer.rights: all rights reserved. Created by Anna Heliasz.

mainDescription: SayRight is your AI-powered companion for mastering English word pronunciation. Browse thousands of words with IPA transcriptions, native audio, categories, and difficulty levels. Sign up to record your pronunciation and receive intelligent feedback with improvement tips. Track your progress by saving words you've mastered or need more practice with. Ready to speak clearly and confidently? Let‚Äôs get started!

ipa.title: Learn IPA Symbols: Videos + Guide
ipa.intro: These videos will help you understand how to read phonetic symbols (IPA). One covers consonants, and the other explains vowels and diphthongs. Subtitles are available in English, Polish, and Spanish.
ipa.subtitlesText: Click the ‚öôÔ∏è (Settings) icon on the video, choose 'Subtitles', and pick your preferred language.
